name: Helpless City
description:
Welcome Explorer, it seems that your city is in danger! Quick protect it at all cost from the waves of enemy's incoming. Use all of your 5 unique buildings to protect yourself and your people from the 15+ enemys that there are. Im praying for your survival.

This game is unfinished andmade in about 3 days because I was bored, also the main system of the game was made with a "Black Thorn Prod" tutorial,  here is the link it was a great Video!
